sentence.Network_en: He bought two tickets and Pullman berths.

sentence.Network_en: There is no smug pullman attached to the train.
sentence.Network_cn: 这列客车上没有挂上豪华的高级卧铺车厢.

sentence.Network_en: Nobody regards Pullman as a real home.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有一个人把普尔曼城看成是自己真正的家.

entry.tran: （豪华型的）普尔曼式列车（或车厢）
entry.def: A Pullman is a type of train or railway carriage which is extremely comfortable and luxurious. You can also refer to a Pullman train or a Pullman carriage.
A Pullman or a Pullman car on a train is a railway car that provides beds for passengers to sleep in.

means.word_mean: 1. luxurious passenger car; for day or night travel
